parameters.name: job_kwargs.n_jobs
parameters.description: Number of jobs, must be a positive number between 0 and 1, or -1 for all processors.

parameters.name: recording_context.electrical_series_path
parameters.description: Path to the electrical series in the NWB file

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.highpass_filter.freq_min
parameters.description: Minimum frequency for the highpass filter

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.phase_shift.margin_ms
parameters.description: Margin in milliseconds for phase shift

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.highpass_spatial_filter.apply_agc
parameters.description: Whether to apply automatic gain control

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.highpass_spatial_filter.agc_window_length_s
parameters.description: Window length in seconds for AGC

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.highpass_spatial_filter.highpass_butter_wn
parameters.description: Natural frequency for the Butterworth filter

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.strategy
parameters.description: What strategy to use for motion correction

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.localize_peaks_kwargs.enforce_decrease
parameters.description: Enforce spatial decreasingness for PTP vectors

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.localize_peaks_kwargs.feature
parameters.description: 'ptp', 'energy' or 'peak_voltage'. The available features to consider for estimating the position via monopolar triangulation are peak-to-peak amplitudes (ptp, default), energy ('energy', as L2 norm) or voltages at the center of the waveform (peak_voltage)

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.interpolate_motion_kwargs.direction
parameters.description: 0 | 1 | 2. Dimension along which channel_locations are shifted (0 - x, 1 - y, 2 - z).

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.interpolate_motion_kwargs.border_mode
parameters.description: 'remove_channels' | 'force_extrapolate' | 'force_zeros'. Control how channels are handled on border.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.interpolate_motion_kwargs.spatial_interpolation_method
parameters.description: The spatial interpolation method used to interpolate the channel locations.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.interpolate_motion_kwargs.num_closest
parameters.description: Number of closest channels used by 'idw' method for interpolation.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.localize_peaks_kwargs.radius_um
parameters.description: Radius in um for channel sparsity.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.localize_peaks_kwargs.feature
parameters.description: 'ptp', 'mean', 'energy' or 'peak_voltage'. Feature to consider for computation

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.interpolate_motion_kwargs.direction
parameters.description: 0 | 1 | 2. Dimension along which channel_locations are shifted (0 - x, 1 - y, 2 - z).

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.interpolate_motion_kwargs.border_mode
parameters.description: 'remove_channels' | 'force_extrapolate' | 'force_zeros'. Control how channels are handled on border.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.interpolate_motion_kwargs.spatial_interpolation_method
parameters.description: The spatial interpolation method used to interpolate the channel locations.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.interpolate_motion_kwargs.num_closest
parameters.description: Number of closest channels used by 'idw' method for interpolation.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.radius_um
parameters.description: Radius in um for channel sparsity.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.upsampling_um
parameters.description: Upsampling resolution for the grid of templates.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.sigma_um
parameters.description: Spatial decays of the fake templates.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.sigma_ms
parameters.description: The temporal decay of the fake templates.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.margin_um
parameters.description: The margin for the grid of fake templates.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.percentile
parameters.description: The percentage in [0, 100] of the best scalar products kept to estimate the position.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.sparsity_threshold
parameters.description: The sparsity threshold (in [0, 1]) below which weights should be considered as 0.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.interpolate_motion_kwargs.direction
parameters.description: 0 | 1 | 2. Dimension along which channel_locations are shifted (0 - x, 1 - y, 2 - z).

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.interpolate_motion_kwargs.border_mode
parameters.description: 'remove_channels' | 'force_extrapolate' | 'force_zeros'. Control how channels are handled on border.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.interpolate_motion_kwargs.spatial_interpolation_method
parameters.description: The spatial interpolation method used to interpolate the channel locations.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.interpolate_motion_kwargs.num_closest
parameters.description: Number of closest channels used by 'idw' method for interpolation.

parameters.name: preprocessing_context.max_bad_channel_fraction_to_remove
parameters.description: Maximum fraction of bad channels to remove

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.preclust_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold crossings for pre-clustering (in PCA projection space)

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.minFR
parameters.description: Minimum spike rate (Hz), if a cluster falls below this for too long it gets removed

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.minfr_goodchannels
parameters.description: Minimum firing rate on a 'good' channel

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.nblocks
parameters.description: blocks for registration. 0 turns it off, 1 does rigid registration. Replaces 'datashift' option.

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.sigmaMask
parameters.description: Spatial constant in um for computing residual variance of spike

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.lam
parameters.description: The importance of the amplitude penalty (like in Kilosort1: 0 means not used, 10 is average, 50 is a lot)

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.ntbuff
parameters.description: Samples of symmetrical buffer for whitening and spike detection

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.nfilt_factor
parameters.description: Max number of clusters per good channel (even temporary ones) 4

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.AUCsplit
parameters.description: Threshold on the area under the curve (AUC) criterion for performing a split in the final step

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.do_correction
parameters.description: If True drift registration is applied

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.wave_length
parameters.description: size of the waveform extracted around each detected peak, (Default 61, maximum 81)

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.keep_good_only
parameters.description: If True only 'good' units are returned

parameters.name: spikesorting_context.skip_kilosort_preprocessing
parameters.description: Can optionaly skip the internal kilosort preprocessing

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.waveforms_raw.return_scaled
parameters.description: Flag to determine if results should be scaled

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.waveforms.return_scaled
parameters.description: Flag to determine if results should be scaled

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.spike_amplitudes.return_scaled
parameters.description: Flag to determine if amplitudes should be scaled

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.spike_amplitudes.outputs
parameters.description: Output format for the spike amplitudes

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.correlograms.window_ms
parameters.description: Size of the window in milliseconds

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.correlograms.bin_ms
parameters.description: Size of the bin in milliseconds

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.isis.window_ms
parameters.description: Size of the window in milliseconds

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.isis.bin_ms
parameters.description: Size of the bin in milliseconds

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.presence_ratio.bin_duration_s
parameters.description: Duration of the bin in seconds.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.sliding_rp_violation.bin_size_ms
parameters.description: The size of binning for the autocorrelogram in ms, by default 0.25.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.sliding_rp_violation.window_size_s
parameters.description: Window in seconds to compute correlogram, by default 1.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.sliding_rp_violation.exclude_ref_period_below_ms
parameters.description: Refractory periods below this value are excluded, by default 0.5

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.sliding_rp_violation.max_ref_period_ms
parameters.description: Maximum refractory period to test in ms, by default 10 ms.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.amplitude_cutoff.num_histogram_bins
parameters.description: The number of bins to use to compute the amplitude histogram.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.amplitude_cutoff.histogram_smoothing_value
parameters.description: Controls the smoothing applied to the amplitude histogram.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.amplitude_cutoff.amplitudes_bins_min_ratio
parameters.description: The minimum ratio between number of amplitudes for a unit and the number of bins. If the ratio is less than this threshold, the amplitude_cutoff for the unit is set to NaN.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nearest_neighbor.max_spikes
parameters.description: The number of spikes to use, per cluster. Note that the calculation can be very slow when this number is >20000.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nearest_neighbor.n_neighbors
parameters.description: The number of neighbors to use.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_isolation.max_spikes
parameters.description: The number of spikes to use, per cluster. Note that the calculation can be very slow when this number is >20000.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_isolation.n_neighbors
parameters.description: The number of neighbors to use.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_isolation.n_components
parameters.description: The number of PC components to use to project the snippets to.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_isolation.radius_um
parameters.description: The radius, in um, that channels need to be within the peak channel to be included.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_noise_overlap.max_spikes
parameters.description: The number of spikes to use, per cluster. Note that the calculation can be very slow when this number is >20000.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_noise_overlap.n_neighbors
parameters.description: The number of neighbors to use.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_noise_overlap.n_components
parameters.description: The number of PC components to use to project the snippets to.

parameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_noise_overlap.radius_um
parameters.description: The radius, in um, that channels need to be within the peak channel to be included.
